frmCaseConv.chkAlwaysFirst: If checked the first letter of every entry / filename will be uppercase ignoring the exceptions
frmCaseConv.chkReplaceSpaceUnder: Space will be replaced by underscore
frmCaseConv.chkReplaceUnderSpace: Underscore will be replaced by space
frmCaseConv.optAllFirstUp: If checked, All First Letters Will Be Set To Upper Case
frmCaseConv.optFirstUp: If checked, the first letter will be set to upper case
frmCaseConv.optAllUp: If checked, all characters will be set to UPPER CASE
frmCaseConv.optAllLow: If checked, all characters will be set to lower case
frmCaseConv.chkVer1: If checked, conversion options will be used on ID3 Tag Version 1
frmCaseConv.chkVer2: If checked, conversion options will be used on ID3 Tag Version 2
frmCaseConv.chkFilename: If checked, conversion options will be used on filename
frmCaseConv.chkArtist: Artist will be modified in TAG
frmCaseConv.chkTitle: Title will be modified in TAG
frmCaseConv.chkAlbum: Album will be modified in TAG
frmCaseConv.chkComment: Comment will be modified in TAG

frmCompareFileTAG.txtDigits: Select number of digits of track number
frmCompareFileTAG.cmbFormat: Enter format of how the filename should look like
frmCompareFileTAG.optTAGV1: Use entries of the TAG Ver. 1 for comparing
frmCompareFileTAG.optTAGV2: Use entries of the TAG Ver. 2 for comparing
frmCompareFileTAG.chkReplaceUnderScore: If checked characters not allowed in filenames will be replaced by '_' for comparing
frmCompareFileTAG.chkIgnoreCase: If checked the case will be ignored

frmDouble.optTAGV1: Use entries of the TAG Ver. 1 for comparing
frmDouble.optTAGV2: Use entries of the TAG Ver. 2 for comparing
frmDouble.optAD: TAG entries will be ignored and the audio data will be compared
frmDouble.optATA: Artist, title and album fields will be compared
frmDouble.optAT: Only artist and title fields will be compared

frmFilenameToTAG1.btnRemove: Entered format will be removed from list of known formats
frmFilenameToTAG1.btnAdd: Entered format will be saved to list of known formats

frmFilenameToTAG2.txtDigits: Select the number of digits to be used when adding track numbers to the TAG
frmFilenameToTAG2.btnRemove: Entered format will be removed from list of known formats
frmFilenameToTAG2.btnAdd: Entered format will be saved to list of known formats
frmFilenameToTAG2.chkSaveName: Saves the current filename to then original filename entry is present in the TAG this entry

frmFreeDB.btnQuery: When clicked ID3-TagIT tries to find all CDs in FreeDB that matched the selected files
frmFreeDB.optVariousArtist: Use this setting if every track on the album has another artist
frmFreeDB.optSingleArtist: Use this setting if the album contains only one artist
frmFreeDB.chkTrack: Search for the entered text in the track fields
frmFreeDB.chkTitle: Search for the entered text in the album title field
frmFreeDB.btnSearch: When clicked ID3-TagIT tries to find all CDs in FreeDB that contain one of the words
frmFreeDB.chkArtistExact: Search entered text has to exactly match the artist field
frmFreeDB.chkArtist: Search for the entered text in the artist field
frmFreeDB.chkComplete: If checked, the search string has to be found completely within the searched field.

frmLibraries.txtDir: Enter the path of the directory which should be added to the currently selected favourite
frmLibraries.txtName: Enter the name of the favourite
frmLibraries.chkOnlyOwn: Check to only use user defined genres
frmLibraries.btnClearA: Clear the entire list of artists
frmLibraries.btnGetArtistV1: Get artists from ID3 Ver. 1 TAGs of scanned files
frmLibraries.btnGetArtistV2: Get artists from ID3 Ver. 2 TAGs of scanned files
frmLibraries.btnClearCommD: Clear the entire list of artists

frmLists.chkRelativ: Check to use relative paths within the playlist
frmLists.btnPath: Select path and filename for the playlist/filelist
frmLists.txtPath: Set path and filename for playlist/filelist, containing the selected files
frmLists.cmbWidth: Select the scale for the width (Pixel / %)
frmLists.optID3V1: Check to use Ver. 1 TAGs to create the list
frmLists.optID3V2: Check to use Ver. 2 TAGs to create the list
frmLists.txtTitleHTML: Define the tilte of the list
frmLists.ColumnsList: Check the boxes of the columns you want to see in the list
frmLists.btnUp: Change the order of the list. Press to move selected column upwards
frmLists.btnDown: Change the order of the list. Press to move selected column downwards

frmOrganize.txtPath: Specify root path under which the files should be organized
frmOrganize.btnAdd: Add the specified format to list
frmOrganize.optID3V2: Check to use Ver. 2 TAG - Infos to organize files
frmOrganize.optID3V1: Check to use Ver. 1 TAG - Infos to organize files
frmOrganize.txtDigits: Select number of digits in track numbers

frmPreferences.cmbPlay: Select what to do with MP3 in Player
frmPreferences.chkExplorerContext: If check, an item ID3-TagIT is shown in the folder context menu of the Windows Explorer
frmPreferences.txtFDigits: Select number of digits to use in filename enumeration
frmPreferences.txtEnumSep: Select separator that will be placed between number and filename
frmPreferences.txtStartNr: Select number to start enumeration with
frmPreferences.chkMouseRenaming: Check to enable renaming by clicking with the left mouse-button
frmPreferences.chkRestore: Check to restore date of a file after tagging it
frmPreferences.txtTFDigits: Select number of digits of the track number in the filname
frmPreferences.optAdd: If checked, selecting a file will add this file to the current seletion
frmPreferences.optSingle: If checked, selecting a file will just select this file
frmPreferences.chkSaveOnExit: Check if ID3-TagIT shall save the path to the folder you worked in the last time to start there again
frmPreferences.optEditCur: If checked, a doubleclick on a file in ID3-TagIT will open an Edit TAG Ver. X dialog corresponding to the current view
frmPreferences.optEditV1: If checked, a doubleclick on a file in ID3-TagIT will open an Edit TAG Ver. 2 dialog
frmPreferences.optEditV2: If checked, a doubleclick on a file in ID3-TagIT will open an Edit TAG Ver. 1 dialog
frmPreferences.chkIgnoreWrite: Check if ID3-TagIT shall ignore the write-protection of files
frmPreferences.chkAudioChecksumCalc: Check if ID3-TagIT should calculate the audiochecksum in the background after reading new files
frmPreferences.ColumnsList: Select which columns shall be shown in ID3-TagIT
frmPreferences.btnUp: Press to move selected column upwards
frmPreferences.btnDown: Press to move selected column downwards
frmPreferences.cmbYearFormat: Chose format of year in Ver. 2 TAGs
frmPreferences.txtTTDigits: Select number of digits for track numbers in Ver. 2 TAGs
frmPreferences.cmbV24Enc: Select text encoding for version 2.4 TAGs
frmPreferences.cmbV23Enc: Select text encoding for version 2.3 TAGs
frmPreferences.chkSingle: Check to only allow 1 genre and comment in TAG Ver. 2
frmPreferences.chkUnSync: Check to write unsyc. Ver. 2 TAGs
frmPreferences.optUse24: Check for ID3-TagIT to use Ver 2.4 Tags when creating new Ver. 2 TAGs
frmPreferences.optUse23: Check for ID3-TagIT to use Ver 2.3 Tags when creating new Ver. 2 TAGs
frmPreferences.btnRemove: Click to remove the selected tool from list
frmPreferences.btnAdd: Click to add the tool to the list
frmPreferences.btnBrowse: Click to select path to tool
frmPreferences.cmbShell: Select what to do with MP3 in Player
frmPreferences.txtParameters: Select parameters to start the tool with
frmPreferences.txtDescription: Description of external tool (e.g. text - editor)
frmPreferences.chkDefault: Check to use the windows - default MP3 - Player (e.g. Windows Media Player / Winamp)

frmRemoveFolders.txtPath: Specify root path under which the files should be organized

frmSearch.txtReplace: Enter string that shall replace search string
frmSearch.btnSelect: Click to search and select files ( no changes will be written to file)
frmSearch.btnReplace: Click to search an replace (there will be changes)
frmSearch.chkFilename: If checked, the search will be done in filename
frmSearch.chkVer1: If checked, the search will be done in Ver. 1 TAGs
frmSearch.chkVer2: If checked, the search will be done in Ver. 2 TAGs
frmSearch.chkRegExpress: If checked, regular expression can be used in the search string
frmSearch.chkSelected: If checked, only the selected files will be searched
frmSearch.chkCase: If checked, the search will be case sensitive (upper and lower case will be distinguished in search)
frmSearch.optAND: If checked, ALL fields in the search MUST contain the search string
frmSearch.optOR: If checked, only one field in the search must contain the search string
frmSearch.chkArtist: If checked, the search will take place in the TAG field artist
frmSearch.chkTitle: If checked, the search will take place in the TAG field title
frmSearch.chkAlbum: If checked, the search will take place in the TAG field album
frmSearch.chkTracknumber: If checked, the search will take place in the TAG field track number
frmSearch.chkYear: If checked, the search will take place in the TAG field year
frmSearch.chkGenre: If checked, the search will take place in the TAG field genre
frmSearch.chkComment: If checked, the search will take place in the TAG field comment

frmTAG1.cmbArtist: Enter lead artist for Ver. 1 TAG

frmTAG1Multi.txtAlbum: Enter album for all selected files
frmTAG1Multi.txtComment: Enter comment for all selected files
frmTAG1Multi.txtTitle: Enter title for all selected files
frmTAG1Multi.CheckBox1: If checked, the information left of this box will be written to the version 1 TAG. Leave it empty and check the box to erase the information stored.
frmTAG1Multi.CheckBox2: If checked, the information left of this box will be written to the version 1 TAG. Leave it empty and check the box to erase the information stored.
frmTAG1Multi.CheckBox3: If checked, the information left of this box will be written to the version 1 TAG. Leave it empty and check the box to erase the information stored.
frmTAG1Multi.CheckBox4: If checked, the information left of this box will be written to the version 1 TAG. Leave it empty and check the box to erase the information stored.
frmTAG1Multi.CheckBox5: If checked, the information left of this box will be written to the version 1 TAG. Leave it empty and check the box to erase the information stored.
frmTAG1Multi.CheckBox6: If checked, the information left of this box will be written to the version 1 TAG. Leave it empty and check the box to erase the information stored.
frmTAG1Multi.CheckBox7: If checked, the information left of this box will be written to the version 1 TAG. Leave it empty and check the box to erase the information stored.
frmTAG1Multi.cmbArtist: Enter lead artist for Ver. 1 TAG

frmTAG1ToFilename.txtDigits: Select number of digits of track number
frmTAG1ToFilename.txtFDigits: File enumeration: Number of digits in enumeration
frmTAG1ToFilename.txtStartNr: File enumeration: Start enumeration with selected number
frmTAG1ToFilename.cmbFormat: Enter format of how the filename should look like

frmTAG2.btnMoveComment: Move selected comment to the top of the list of comments of the file
frmTAG2.btnRemoveComment: Remove selected comment from list of comments of file
frmTAG2.btnAddComment: Add entered comment to list of comments of file
frmTAG2.btnMoveGenre: Move selected genre to the top of the list
frmTAG2.btnTLEN: Calculates the track length in msec
frmTAG2.txtTLEN: Enter the track length in msec
frmTAG2.txtYear: Contains the year or date information in the format yyyy-mm-dd
frmTAG2.cmbMedia: Enter media type the selected track was recorded from
frmTAG2.txtAlbum: Enter album the selected file belongs to
frmTAG2.txtSortArtist: Enter the name of artist used for sorting (e. g. Police, The)
frmTAG2.txtSortTitle: Enter the title string used for sorting
frmTAG2.txtSortAlbum: Enter the album string used for sorting
frmTAG2.txtTORY: Contains the original release year or date information in the format yyyy-mm-dd
frmTAG2.txtOOwner: Enter name of the original owner (who owns the license for the original song)
frmTAG2.txtOArtist: Enter name of the original artist (if this is a cover)
frmTAG2.txtOAlbum: Enter name of album of the original song (if this file is a cover)
frmTAG2.txtOLyWriter: Enter songwriter of the original song (if this is a cover)
frmTAG2.txtOFilename: Enter filename of the original song (if this is a cover)
frmTAG2.txtContent: Specify the content group (if the genre was classical the content group could be piano concert)
frmTAG2.txtSubTitle: Enter the subtitle (perhaps something like live in athens)
frmTAG2.txtComposer: Enter name of compser of this file
frmTAG2.txtBand: Enter name of band / orchestra, lead artist works with in this file
frmTAG2.txtModified: This song was remixed / modified by
frmTAG2.txtMusicianName: Enter the name of the musician
frmTAG2.btnRemoveMusician: Click to remove selected musician from list
frmTAG2.btnAddMusician: Click to add entered musician to list
frmTAG2.txtMusicianInst: Enter the instrument the musician plays
frmTAG2.txtInvPerson: Enter the name of the involved person
frmTAG2.btnRemoveInv: Click to remove selected person from list
frmTAG2.btnAddInv: Click to add entered person to list
frmTAG2.txtInvFunction: Enter the function of the person
frmTAG2.txtLyWriter: Enter the name of songwriter of this file
frmTAG2.txtEncoded: Enter the name of the one who encoded this file
frmTAG2.btnExPic: Save picture to a new file by extracting it from the MP3 file
frmTAG2.txtPicPath: This is the path to the file
frmTAG2.APICView: This is the picture embedded in this file
frmTAG2.btnMoveRating: Click to move selected rating to the top of the list
frmTAG2.btnRemoveRating: Click to remove selected rating from list
frmTAG2.btnAddRating: Click to add entered rating to list
frmTAG2.txtRatingCounter: Select, how often this file has been played
frmTAG2.txtRatingRating: Enter your rating (1 ist worst, 255 is best)
frmTAG2.txtINetRadioURL: Enter URL to internet Radio station
frmTAG2.btnRemoveWXXX: Click to remove selected web frame from list
frmTAG2.btnAddWXXX: Click to add entered web frame to list
frmTAG2.txtTXXXContent: Enter the content, the text frame shall contain
frmTAG2.btnRemoveTXXX: Click to remove selected text frame from list
frmTAG2.btnAddTXXX: Click to enter user text frame to list
frmTAG2.cmbGenre: Enter the genre the song belongs to
frmTAG2.txtPos1: Number in media set, a 0 will remove this part
frmTAG2.txtPos2: Total number of medias, a 0 will remove this part
frmTAG2.txtTrack1: Track number on album, a 0 will remove this part
frmTAG2.txtTrack2: Total number of tracks, a 0 will remove this part

frmTAG2Multi.CheckBox38: If checked, all existing comments will be erased before any entry is made to the version 2 TAG.
frmTAG2Multi.CheckBox10: If checked, all existing comments will be erased before any entry is made to the version 2 TAG.

frmTAG2Multi.btnAddComment: Add entered comment to list of comments
frmTAG2Multi.CheckBox9: If checked, the information left of this box will be written to TAG Ver. 2. Leave it empty and check the box to erase the information stored.

frmTAG2Multi.chkTLEN: If checked every file gets a TAG entry with the track length in msec
frmTAG2Multi.txtYear: Contains the year or date information in the format yyyy-mm-dd

frmTransfer.opt12: If checked, TAG information will be transfered from Ver. 1 TAG to Ver. 2 TAG
frmTransfer.opt21: If checked, TAG information will be transfered from Ver. 2 TAG to Ver. 1 TAG
frmTransfer.optConvert34: If checked, the Ver. 2.3 TAG will be converted to Ver. 2.4
frmTransfer.optConvert43: If checked, the Ver. 2.4 TAG will be converted to Ver. 2.3
